html.p: The militia are very suspicious indeed, although they clearly know the grey-robed men to be evil people. They cart you off to jail and keep you there for some time.

text.p: Because you tried to escape through the window of the tavern room, they hold you for five days (add 10 to your Time Track). Then they turf you out. Click here to continue.
Because you didn't try to escape through the window of the tavern room, they hold you for two days (add 4 to your Time Track). Then they turf you out. Click here to continue.
